title: Baby Face Nelson
summary: Lester Joseph Gillis (December 6, 1908â€“ November 27, 1934),[1] also known as George Nelson and as Baby Face Nelson, was an American bank robber who became a criminal partner of John Dillinger, when he helped Dillinger escape from prison, in Crown Point, Indiana. Later, the Federal Bureau of Investigation (FBI) formally identified Nelson and the remaining gang of bank robbers as: "Public Enemy Number One" of American society.
